title: More firms, increased supply of computers

content.question: Which of the following would cause the supply curve for notebook computers to shift to the right?

choices.label: An increase in the price of notebook computers
An increase in the number of firms producing notebook computers
An increase in the wages of workers in the notebook-computer industry
A decrease in the price of notebook computers
A decrease in the supply of notebook computers

content.answer: An increase in the number of firms producing notebook computers

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
